abstract.t: This document defines the Time Zone Information Format (TZif) for representing and exchanging time zone information, independent of any particular service or protocol. A MIME media type for this format is also defined. Open Issues o Should we require TZDIST servers to always return a particular format (2 or 3) with/without leap seconds? Or should we allow the client to choose what they want (via parameters on the MIME type)? E.g. application/tzif+leap; version=3 o Is the MIME registration complete and correct (e.g. any security or privacy considerations)?
